00029 namespace random_utilities
00030 {
00031     // The state that needs to be saved for the SUSv3 random number
00032     // functions.
00033     enum
00034     {
00035         RANDOM_STATE_ARRAY_SIZE = 3 // 3 x uint16_t = 48 bits (required amount)
00036     };
00037 
00038     // Keep state in this
00039     struct seed_t
00040     {
00041         uint16_t s[RANDOM_STATE_ARRAY_SIZE];
00042 
00043         seed_t(void) { memset(s, 0, sizeof(s)); }
00044         seed_t(const uint16_t a, const uint16_t b, const uint16_t c)
00045         {
00046             s[0] = a;
00047             s[1] = b;
00048             s[2] = c;
00049         }
00050         seed_t(uint16_t t[RANDOM_STATE_ARRAY_SIZE]){ memcpy(s, t, sizeof(s)); }
00051         seed_t(const seed_t &t)                    { memcpy(s, t.s, sizeof(s));}
00052         ~seed_t(void) {}
00053 
00054         seed_t &operator =(const seed_t &t)
00055         {
00056             if (this != &t)
00057                 memcpy(s, t.s, sizeof(s));
00058             return *this;
00059         }
00060 
00061         // Return elements of state array
00062         const uint16_t &operator [](const unsigned int index) const 
00063         {
00064             return s[index];
00065         }
00066     };
00067 
00068     std::ostream &operator <<(std::ostream &o, const seed_t &t);
00069 
00070     void seed_erand48(const seed_t &p);
00071     void seed_nrand48(const seed_t &p);
00072     void seed_jrand48(const seed_t &p);
00073     void seed_all(const seed_t &p);
